flavorText: Even vampires know to travel faster when they hear howling in the Geier Reach passes.

name: Hungry Ridgewolf
originalText: As long as you control another Wolf or Werewolf, Hungry Ridgewolf gets +1/+0 and has trample.

rulings.text: If you control both a Wolf and a Werewolf, Hungry Ridgewolf still only gets +1/+0.
